text: tatha kya shobhaneey bana diya gaya ho jisake lie usaka kukarm aur vah use achchha samajhata ho? to allaah hee kupath karata hai, jise chaahe aur supath dikhaata hai, jise chaahe. atah, na khoyen aap apana praan inapar santaap ke kaaran. vaastav mein, allaah jaanata hai, jo kuchh ve kar rahe hain
